General.Name: Electrica SA
General.Description: Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in electricity distribution and supply business in Romania. It operates through Electricity Supply, Electricity Distribution, and External Electricity Network Maintenance segments. The company provides electricity distribution services to electricity suppliers; and supplies electricity to consumers in North Muntenia, Northern Transylvania, and Southern Transylvania. It also offers construction, repair, maintenance, and other services for electricity networks. The company was formerly known as Societatea de Distributie si Furnizare a Energiei Electrice Electrica S.A. and changed its name to Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A. in April 2016. Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A. was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Bucharest, Romania.
